author: BigBang1112
name: GBX.NET Console App
description: A simple GBX.NET console app to work with a Gbx file.

EnableLzo.displayName: Enable Gbx body read/write and other LZO features
EnableLzo.description: LZO is required for full Gbx reading and writing. Be aware that LZO is GNU GPL v3 licensed.

EnableZlib.displayName: Enable ghost samples, lightmap data, and other zlib features

EnableCrc32.displayName: Improve MapUid modification support and other CRC32 features
EnableCrc32.description: Changing the MapUid or HashedPassword of a map without calculating its CRC32 can open the password prompt. Enable this to fix this problem.

SaveGbx.displayName: Modify and save the Gbx to a new file
SaveGbx.description: Changes the example to the best practices when wanting to modify a Gbx file.

EnableNativeAOT.description: Makes the final build smaller and quicker to run, but be aware that it has various limitations.
